entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
